definitions.definition: A person who appraises the works of others.
examples: Following its publication, the novel received widespread acclaim from literary critics .

definitions.definition: A specialist in judging works of art.
One who criticizes ; a person who finds fault .
Obsolete form of critique ( “ an act of criticism ” ) .
Obsolete form of critique ( “ the art of criticism ” ) .

main_definition: A person who appraises the works of others.

Obsolete form of critique ( “ an act of criticism ” ) .
